# 🏋️️ Grid System

Responsive 12‑column grid using Flexbox.

| Element | Class | Notes |
|---------|-------|-------|
| Container | `.grid` / `.grid--with-gutter` | Adds optional gap |
| Cell | `.grid-cell` | Width via `.is-6`, `.is-third`, etc. |
| Breakpoint | `.is-4--m` | `--s`, `--m`, `--l` suffixes |

### Best Practice
- Works inside Layout Builder or normal regions.
- No extra templates required.
- Compose with spacing utilities; keep markup minimal.
